SWT - transferring to you for comment.  Don't know if this is your's or not 
but I don't think there has been much activity in the Drag and Drop sector 
here.  Please reassign if I'm wrong.

This is not an SWT problem.  Adding and removing listeners must be done in the 
UI thread and this has been the case since day one.

PartDragDrop does not use DragDource/DropTarget - it is the mechanism for 
rearranging views on the desktop and implements its own "drag-like" 
behaviour.  There was working in this area recently to add the ability to 
detach views (Eduardo).

There has also been work recently in the area of performing more tasks in 
background threads.

The sync view seems to be making ui related calls but is not running in the UI 
thread.

Fix released to HEAD. I didn't realize that getEditor() could end up closing an
editor and need the be done in the UI thread :)
